events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund as it does not fit properly and I would like my money back.
The customer's request mentions wanting a refund due to size issues, categorizing the issue under Refund.
Support agent John Smith has been assigned to handle the refund case regarding the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m John, and I’ll be assisting you today with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can proceed with your refund?
Sure, my order number is 4587312. The jacket is too small and I would like to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process once you ship the jacket back to us using the prepaid return label we will send shortly.
Great, that sounds convenient. I appreciate the prepaid label. I will send the jacket back within the next two days.
The return label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received the return label and if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Yes, I got the label and shipped the jacket yesterday. Thanks for your help!
The jacket return was received and your refund has been processed successfully. We are closing this case now.
A survey has been sent to you to rate your satisfaction with our refund process support.
